HOME.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Ehyɛ yɛn ho ban na yɛn hyɛ Stellar Security so
HOME.WITHOUT_TRACE_DESCRIPTION: Yɛhyɛ nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn ahotɔ wɔ wo sensitive information no. Data nyinaa wɔ client-side so. Yɛnte wo IP address, nea wopɛ sɛ wosian anaa wɔn a wɔkyɛ secret links no - na nsɛm a ɛda ho.
HOME.PRIVACY_PROTECTED_DESCRIPTION: Wo na kɛkɛ na woyɛ nea ɔnim link a ɛda ho sɛnea ɛyɛ secret information a woyɛ no ne wɔn a wode kyerɛ wɔn. Sɛ wopɛ sɛ yɛyɛ secret a, wubetumi de password a ɛda ho kɔmɔ. Sɛ wopɛ a, wubetumi de burner-time a ɛda ho. Akyɛde a ɛda ho no bɛyɛ deleted akyiri nnansa anaa da koro.
HOME.END_TO_END_ENCRYPTED_DESCRIPTION: Links ne content nyinaa wɔ client-side so. Eyi kyerɛ sɛ yɛn nso yɛnte link no ne content no. Link biara wɔ unique ID a ɛyɛ 36 a ɛyɛ one-way encryption de yɛbɛtumi akɔ Secret Message ne content no a ɛda ho na ɛyɛ AES-256.
HOME.STEP_1_TITLE: Kyerɛ w' message na/anaa kyerɛ password
HOME.SHARE_DESCRIPTION_PART_1: Kyerɛ na to message no, ɛbɛyɛ
HOME.SHARE_ENCRYPTED_BY: Ehyɛ yɛn ho ban na yɛn hyɛ Stellar Security so
HOME.SHARE_TEXTAREA_PLACEHOLDER: Kyerɛ w' Secret message, password anaa sensitive information *
HOME.SHARE_EMPTY: Gyae kwan sɛ wopɛ a, fa nni hɔ.
HOME.CREATED_TITLE_SHARE: Fa link no kyɛ anaa share.

HOWITWORK.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY: Ehyɛ yɛn ho ban na yɛn hyɛ Stellar Security so
HOWITWORK.ENCRYPTED_PROTECTED_BY_DESCRIPTION: Stellar Secret ma w’anya ɔkwan a ɛyɛ kɛse sɛ wɔde link a ɛda ho adi kɔma ɔbarima koro pɛ na ɛda ho adi, a ɛnyɛ w’ankasa na ɔyɛ nkyerɛkyerɛ. Ɛyɛ ɔkwan pa ara a ɛyɛ sɛ wopɛ sɛ wode nsɛm a ɛyɛ sɛ nkɔmɔ a ɛyɛ hɔ pɛ fi nkɔmɔ-apps nyinaa.
